ygData.subject: RE: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I forget the exact wording, but on a 4 Amyg pull: Cazic Thule shouts Beware Infidels! Those who taint my plane I shall rend your minds with Terror,
ygData.messageBody:
> with a half bub in 46 and only one cleric in the zone you don't let an Amy
> hit you more than once or twice before backing off. :-)

I forget the exact wording, but on a 4 Amyg pull:

Cazic Thule shouts 'Beware Infidels! Those who taint my plane I
shall rend your minds with Terror, Fright,
and the other big fat golem dude'

an Amyg knight says 'Such is the will of Cazic Thule!'
an Amyg knight says 'Such is the will of Cazic Thule!'
an Amyg knight says 'Such is the will of Cazic Thule!'
an Amyg knight says 'Such is the will of Cazic Thule!'

Really freaky... I proceeded to then switch to lower taunt
manasong and find a nice warrior to hide behind ;) (j/k)

Harmonic.
